title: encoding/xml: did not see expected CDATA
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?
```
$ go version
go version go1.6 darwin/amd64
```

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
```
$ go env
GOARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTARCH="amd64"
GOHOSTOS="darwin"
GOOS="darwin"
GOPATH="/Users/***"
GOROOT="/usr/local/go"
GOTOOLDIR="/usr/local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64"
GO15VENDOREXPERIMENT="1"
CC="clang"
GOGCCFLAGS="-fPIC -m64 -fno-caret-diagnostics -Qunused-arguments -fmessage-length=0 -fno-common"
CXX="clang++"
CGO_ENABLED="0"
```

3. What did you do?
If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error.
A complete runnable program is good.
A link on play.golang.org is best.

http://play.golang.org/p/23xH1pmJuv

4. What did you expect to see?
```
<Response><KKName><![CDATA[ something bulabula ]]></KKName><Age>12</Age></Response>
```
https://golang.org/pkg/encoding/xml/#Marshal

5. What did you see instead?
```
<Response><KKName>something bulabula</KKName><Age>12</Age></Response>
```
